Package org.ensor.algorithms.astar

This is an abstract implementation of the classic AStar algorithm.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMap<Mover extends IPathMover,Node extends IPathNode>
    This interface represents a map or graph to be traversed using the AStar algorithm.
    IPathMover
    This interface represents an object which can move in a map of IPathNode objects.
    IPathNode
    One particular node in a map of nodes traversed with the AStar algorithm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AStar<M extends IPathMover,N extends IPathNode>
    This is an abstract implementation of the classic AStar algorithm.

Package org.ensor.algorithms.astar Description

This is an abstract implementation of the classic AStar algorithm. The algorithm is used to find a least cost path given a set of nodes in a graph. The algorithm is implemented as a Java generic algorithm so that the graph used and the cost parameter are completely abstract. In addition, several concrete applications of the algorithm are made available for use including a 2-d grid, 3-d grid, and a 2-d hex grid.
